app_tour_welcome_desc: A complete informative Nepali Patro/Calendar (BS) on your phone. Get updated with Nepali dates, tithi and events to organize yourself.
app_tour_events_desc: Never miss to plan for religious festivals or formal events. Easy to use interface for finding dates, festivals and events in Nepali & English.
app_tour_panchanga_desc:
Little more interested in 'Vedic Astrology'? 

Get more on 'Panchanga' and find out 'Suva Sait' for marriage, bratabandha, rudri, hom etc.
app_tour_rashifal_desc: Read today's free daily rashifal for all zodiac signs. Learn what the day has in store for you with Nepali Patro.
app_tour_news_desc: Covers all latest breaking news, Top and Trending news across Nepal and worldwide. Check latest updates on Business, Finance and Economy across Nepal.
app_tour_calendar_desc: You can create your own events based on Bikram Sambat, Nepal Sambat or AD Calendar.
calendar_not_modifiable: Sorry, you cannot modify this calendar.
calendarmenu_tooltip: Swipe left on calendar for more menu.
calendar_delete_info: All the events stored in this calendar will be lost. You cannot undo this action.
rashifal_expired: The Rashifal shown might be stale, please refresh.
rashifal_default_message: Select your default Rashifal and option to enable daily Rashifal notification. If you select cancel, you can later configure it from app settings.
goto_text: Please choose calendar type, year and month to navigate on calendar.
my_events_help: "My Events" lets you to add reminders based on B.S date. You can add it by clicking on the button below or from the calendar.
enable_sync_message: To enable cloud sync, please Sign in
event_delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this event?

tithi_data_not_valid_message: The events marked with '*' are generated through preliminary computation, actual data may vary. Actual data will appear once the Panchanga Niranayak Samiti publishes the event dates.

subscription_detail: Ads in Nepali Patro is to keep Nepali Patro servers and services running. We are providing users an option to disable Ads. To do that users can purchase our subscription to be listed as our premium user.

calendar_scroll_message: Press 'Ok' to make the calendar scrollable.
